subtitle: Hello everyone this video has been released on June 14th 2022 on the day of the full moon
also known as a super moon today and also it is Saga Dawa making it the most important full moon
of the year and as a result of this period the 'Gnostic Method' app has been released today by my
gnostic friend who did a great work creating it if you're trying to find the light in your life and
you're interested in the gnostic teachings i recommend to go and download this free app
all the links will be in the description below and i just want to show you how to install the
app uh give you a bit of a showcase and also some words of wisdom on how to best approach all of the
knowledge and practices that are given in it so when you first open the app you'll see this
introduction page and the purpose here is to help you understand that when you're really looking for
the light looking for the path to awaken and that when you find something that really has that light
and has that treasure to show you the direct way to walk the path we have to understand that
we shouldn't approach this treasure like how we approach the rest of earthly matters in the
sense that we just want to consume information and read over things quickly we need a special type of
spiritual and studious mindset we have to prepare our mind in the best way we can
to really comprehend what we are reading and to also comprehend our own comprehension so we have
to learn to not take words at face value and judge them through our own interpretations but
to strive to extract the objective essence of the teachings so that we can truly expand our
awareness and understanding and consciousness you know one person can read a book and learn nothing
and another person can read the same book and completely transform their life
right so what the app is suggesting to help us prepare the mind properly is to have a pencil
or pen and two notebooks the first is for making notes as you progress through the lessons writing
down things that come to you important parts that you learn and also to keep track of where you
are in the lessons along with the dates that you studied them just one purpose of this book is to
also help you see your own progression over time since we lack self-observation we often overlook
how our thinking and feeling is changing as we advance through reading and practicing
okay so that's your first kind of uh life wisdom journal through your own progress
the second book is your dream and astral journal i know most of you probably already have one by now
if you don't be sure to get one and keep it next to your bed and remember that
we are not just striving for exciting astral projection experiences but we are looking for
valuable information from our psyche in order for us to awaken more and more
when we start to see our dreams then we really start to understand how unconscious we truly
are and how much we don't understand our own unconscious and understand ourselves
so this book helps us to work on ourselves at a deeper subconscious level by studying
and comprehending our dreams then by finding those hidden gems in the darkness of our subconscious
we slowly begin to liberate our consciousness and start to have more astral projection experiences
where we then obtain even deeper gnosis about ourselves and consciousness and reality
so here's the three main approaches that the app suggests to get the most out of the course number
one read through the lessons at your own steady pace making notes on what comes to your heart
as you study the app has about nine to twelve months of study material depending on your pace
but for some it may take years of study and of course ultimately it takes many years or you know
even a lifetime to fully comprehend everything and let all of that wisdom come to fruition within us
right number two reflect on the lessons during your day and explore them in your daily life
finding evidence of the information through direct experience you know we usually go through
life just uh mechanically and unconsciously right there's not many people who really
go through life with a contemplative mindset so you know this is a nice aspect that we can
add to our daily living and not just when we're reading but applying that wisdom and things that
we've studied to our relationships experiences and the emotions that we go through in life number
three in the evening sitting comfortably or lying in bed relaxed but focused and with closed eyes
listen to the audio recording of the lesson this way you'll begin to integrate the topics with ease
and clarity by not just reading but living and contemplating and meditating on the information
day by day so those voice recordings are really wonderful to listen to and soak it in
in a different kind of way so you see we don't just want to read and then that's it reading
with the intellect is just the first stage after that we then want to experience and meditate on
the information so that the information can then pass on to the emotional center and then into our
essence this is how we grow our own inner gnosis not grow the intellect but grow our self knowledge
we don't want to be stuck at the intellect the intellect is like a scanner of information it
is just memory just a tool it is through the emotions and the essence our consciousness
where we can find that true comprehension then that knowledge is no longer intellectual knowledge
no longer memory of the past but it becomes a living experience a permanent
factor of our consciousness so the point of this advice is to advise you not to rush but to
integrate the information often the teachings of gnosis can be overwhelming because there's
so much information and sometimes we say in many lessons what the master says
only in a few words but with that said my friend has done a beautiful job of helping us to have
clearer comprehension of these teachings and yeah i really hope you enjoy it you can truly
change your life in a complete way if you follow it with your heart
so as you'll see in the menu of the app there are quite a few sections extra information
resources a part dedicated to practices you'll see some of my videos being added there too
and many other interesting things so you can have a browse but the main thing i want to point out is
that when you're going through the course on each section you'll see the reading part on the left
and then a spoken word tab on the right these are beautiful voice recordings from another friend on
the path she recently found the gnostic teachings too and is doing a great job in her own life
and so yes these recordings are simply another way to meditate deeper on the material
now to actually install the app you don't need to go to the play store or anything simply go to
the link in the description and it will open the app in your browser as you can see on the screen
it should then give you the option to add the app to your home screen clicking this actually
installs it as an app for you if you don't see the option add to home screen it's probably because
you're in preview mode so simply open the link in your browser app wait a few seconds and you
should see the app at the bottom afterwards the app icon will then be on your device as a normal
app if it's still not working try another browser um if that's still not working uh feel free to
ask me for help in the comments below i also know there's quite a few of you who joined the
telegram from my initial video on this app i was really surprised to see how many of you fell in
love with the teachings quickly so if you'd like to help spread the word about the app
for the sake of humanity's awakening there's an invitation poster which you can see on the screen
the links are in the description for this and you can print it off
stick it in public places such as notice boards yoga centers and or just also share the image
online when i was part of my first gnostic group many years ago i'd just be sticking it anywhere
like lampposts phone boxes bus stops etc um but yeah don't get in trouble if you do that uh
alternatively you can also just share the link to the app as well okay so again if any of you have
trouble downloading the app just let me know um comment down below what you think of it hopefully
you like it it is a really great resource um it it really has the essence of the gnostic teachings at
heart for you to read and study and practice and to integrate this kind of information um you will
see for yourself if you apply it that it really transforms our self and our life so yes thank you
everyone enjoy take your time meditate and reap the benefits of knowledge through self-knowledge
